overview:
The Video Producer and Photographer Joseph F. Cardenas, B.S.C.

-International Photographer, Mix Media Artist, Eco Tourism Books Editor & Publisher, Video producer with more than 25 years of experience in the areas of visual communications in The United States, Central and South America. A Graduate from The University of Texas, Austin with a Bachelor of Science in Communications, Photojournalism, Radio, Television and Film.

Featured in the1992 publication of: WHO’S WHO IN PUBLIC RELATIONS, throughout The United States and Canada.

His experience as War Photojournalist, Medical Video Producer, Paparazzi, Fashion Scout, and corporate training on videos has given Joe opportunities to work with different multinational companies such as: ABC News, 20/20, NBC News, CNN, The Heartbeat of America T.V., United Surgical, Boston Scientific, Caterpillar, NASA, USIA and various government entities In North and South America.

Images Through My Lens (ID #5243311) Fist Edition Book a collection of photographs ranging from: Eco- Tourism in The mountains â€œ Sierra Dona Franciscaâ€ Brazil , The famousâ€ Dance Festival of Joinvilleâ€, The southern port of Sao Francisco in the State of Santa Catarina, Brazil to The Statue of Liberty in New York and â€œThe Big Boat s Raceâ€ in the Florida Keys, USA.
